column2: Navios Maritime Containers LP engages in the provision of container solutions in the maritime industry in Asia and Europe. The firm operates as an international owner and operator of containerships. Additionally, Navios Maritime Containers also provides crewing and technical management services and provides solutions for business partnersâ€™ special requirements. The firm handles freight movements and bulk cargo logistics around the world. Its portfolio includes handymax, panamax, capsize and risk management, among others. Apart from Monaco, the Company operates globally.
